Body:
self.model_half = DiscreteMNL(solver='newton-cg', fit_intercept=True,
    est_stderr=True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001,
    max_iter=100, coef=None, stderr=None, classes=None)
self.model_half.fit(self.data_anes96.exog, self.data_anes96.endog,
    sample_weight=0.5)
self.model = DiscreteMNL(solver='newton-cg', fit_intercept=True, est_stderr
    =True, reg_method='l2', alpha=0, l1_ratio=0, tol=0.0001, max_iter=100,
    coef=None, stderr=None, classes=None)
self.model.fit(self.data_anes96.exog, self.data_anes96.endog)
np.testing.assert_array_almost_equal(self.model.coef, self.model_half.coef,
    decimal=3)
self.assertEqual(np.sum(self.model.predict(self.data_anes96.exog) == self.
    data_anes96.endog), 372)
self.assertAlmostEqual(self.model.loglike(self.data_anes96.exog, self.
    data_anes96.endog, sample_weight=0.5), old_div(-1461.92274725, 2.0),
    places=3)
